headDescription: Snapod is a podcast hosting platform dedicated to providing podcast enthusiasts with comprehensive and powerful features and solutions for podcast creation, operation and continuous growth.
headerDes1: Create, operate and grow your podcasts with Snapod
featureDes1: Create your first podcast in just a few steps, then grow fast
featureDes2: Import existing podcasts via RSS with just one click
featureDes3: Real-time RSS Feed generating and synchronizing
featureDes4: Choose between serial/episodic podcast types; write show notes in MarkDown and much more
featureDes5: No audio file upload limits, both .mp3 and .m4a format are support
featureDes6: Set up a dedicated website for your podcast in just a few seconds
featureDes7: Snapod automatically collects analytical data across several key metrics such as plays, listener geolocation and listening platforms/devices
featureDes8: Snapod generates iTunes compatible RSS feeds that are updated automatically, and can be submit to every mainstream podcast platform
clientsDes: Only macOS and Windows clients are available for early access
pricingDes: Pricing has not been finalized yet
priceDes2: Everything but custom domain and site themes
cannotJoin: Cannot add you to the wait list at this time
